plot: It is not often you see dead people these days. I have seen only three in my life. One of them was Lenin.
title: All the Dead I Have Seen
plot_es: It is not often you see dead people these days. I have seen only three in my life. One of them was Lenin.
original_name: All the Dead I Have Seen
plot_en: It is not often you see dead people these days. I have seen only three in my life. One of them was Lenin.
